illustartionTitle: A new approach to currency exchange
illustrationMark2: Replenish in a convenient affordable way
aboutTitle:
Every day we try to make buying and selling cryptocurrencies accessible to every user.
MintExchange offers a convenient solution for exchanging cryptocurrencies and withdrawing funds to your bank card
whyUsSmallTitle: We are the best in what we do
whyUs1: One of the best exchange rates
whyUs5: The service is available to everyone
howItWorks1: Complete the registration and identity verification procedure
howItWorks2: Replenish the wallet you need in the chosen way
howItWorks3: Make an exchange by transferring from wallet to wallet
howItWorks4: Withdrawals are available for each method
soon1: Withdraw funds, replenish crypto wallets using our <GreenText>ATMs</GreenText>
